title: Enemies & Bosses
description: How well do you know the baddies of the Mushroom Kingdom?

questions.question: What is the name of the walking mushroom enemies?
questions.explanation: Goombas are the iconic brown mushroom enemies that are defeated with a simple stomp!

questions.question: Koopa Troopas have shells that Mario can kick.
questions.explanation: Koopa Troopas retreat into their shells when stomped, which Mario can then kick at other enemies!

questions.question: What enemy hides in clouds and throws Spinies?
questions.explanation: Lakitu floats on a cloud and throws Spinies down at Mario. In Mario Kart, he also rescues fallen racers!

questions.question: What are Bowser's children called?
questions.explanation: The Koopalings are Bowser's seven minions: Larry, Morton, Wendy, Iggy, Roy, Lemmy, and Ludwig!

questions.question: Boos are ghosts that stop moving when you look at them.
questions.explanation: Boos are shy ghosts that cover their faces and freeze when Mario looks at them, but chase him when he turns away!

questions.question: What enemy shoots bullets from cannons?
questions.explanation: Bullet Bills are large bullet-shaped enemies fired from Bill Blasters, flying straight at Mario!

questions.question: What is Bowser Jr.'s relationship to Bowser?
questions.explanation: Bowser Jr. is Bowser's son, first appearing in Super Mario Sunshine where he believed Peach was his mother!

questions.question: Chain Chomps are dog-like enemies attached to chains.
questions.explanation: Chain Chomps are aggressive ball-and-chain enemies that lunge at Mario, inspired by a dog that scared Miyamoto as a child!
